profileAlternative.name: Pallav Anand
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist II at Amazon
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. Skilled in Data Science and Predictive Modeling. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Science (M.S.) focused in Industrial Engineering (Data Analytics) from Texas A&M University.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. Skilled in Data Science and Predictive Modeling. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Science (M.S.) focused in Industrial Engineering (Data Analytics) from Texas A&M University.

given.text: I supervised Pallav during his internship at Optimal Asset Management. Working with Pallav was a pleasure. He showed interest in tackling a difficult research task that we gave him. Even tho the subject was way out of his comfort zone at the time (quantitative finance), he persisted working hard on it, to move forward the project. He was effective at following instructions and coming up with ideas to resolve the problem at hand. See less

items: Fraud Detection in Credit Card Transactions(Capital One Case)
Drug Repositioning using microarray data analysis, Texas A&M University
Expansion Strategy and Location Planning using Linear and Mixed Binary Programming(AMPL/CPLEX)
Output Optimization of Hydrokinetic Turbines using Genetic Algorithms

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Manager, Data Science & Engineering at Netflix
